{{menu.name}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-body', templateUrl: './body.component.html', styleUrls: ['./body.component.css'], }) export class BodyComponent { menus: any = [ { name: 'Lunch', url: '/assets/res.jpg', }, { name: 'Breakfast', url: '/assets/res.jpg', }, { name: 'Dinner', url: '/assets/res.jpg', }, ]; }
